snippet: Berlin has taken a step beyond European Union sanctions on Moscow by preventing a German defense firm from providing parts for a high-tech training center.
abstract: Germany blocks delivery of parts for high-tech military training center scheduled to be completed in Russia by end of 2014, further increasing pressure that country over involvement its in Ukraine; move goes beyond sanctions adopted by European Union members, which do not apply to existing military contracts.
lead_paragraph: Berlin has taken a step beyond European Union sanctions on Moscow by preventing a German defense firm from providing parts for a high-tech training center.

headline.main: Germany Blocks the Delivery of Military Parts to Russia
headline.print_headline: Germany Blocks the Delivery of Military Parts to Russia
